{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 802.11n Wireless ADSL2+ with 4x FE ports Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Vodafone |model = DSL-EasyBox 903 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141952C20002J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq;PSB 50702;XWAY DANUBE, PSB 50702 E, V1.4; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kec |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 333 <!-- 333 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL128EL; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Lantiq;PSB 6970;PSB 6970 V, V1.3, XWAY TANTOS; |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 74:31:70 |oui = 74:31:70
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 15 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, VDSL2, |addchip = xDSL AFE/Line Drive Companion Chip;Infineon (Lantiq);PSB 80190;Lantiq, PSB 80190 V, V1.1, XWAY VRX208;1; ,,, Second Generation Modular ISDN NT (Intelligent) Chip;Infineon (Lantiq);PEF 82902;Lantiq, PEF 82902 F, V1.1;1; ,,, Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Lantiq;PEF 4268;Lantiq, PEF 4268 V V1.2 (XWAY SLIC120); |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 123456 |defaultssid = EasyBox-XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^EasyBox-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = VRV752DHW22 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3062F; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <!-- "P/N: 141752D20022J REV: 01B" -->
*[[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 903]] - [[Arcadyan]] [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vrv752dhw22 VRV752DHW22] :SoC: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) ''VINAX'' @333MHz (Dual core) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX29GL128EL (16MB NOR) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWQD-25H (64MB DDR2) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT3062F (802.11bgn 2T2R WiSoC) :ETH: [[Lantiq]] PSB 6970 V; 4x FE (100Mbps) ports :ADSL: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) ''XWAY VRX208'' (ADSL2+) :VoIP: [[Lantiq]] PEF 4268 V V1.2 (''XWAY SLIC120''), 3x FXS
{{See also|ZyXEL P-661HNU-F3|Arcadyan}}
